Class Space

java.lang.Object
  Environment
      Space

public class Space
extends Environment

Space: the final frontier! It is essentially a container for the invader and the cannon.

Version:
assign3
Author:
babak

resolve

public void resolve()
Determines the new state of the game based on the location of items. In the case of Space Invaders:
  • if a bullet has hit the cannon, set the cannon to null and remove the bullet
  • if a bullet has hit the invader, set the invader to null and remove the bullet
  • if a bullet has reached the edge of the screen, remove it.
NOTE: you can't modify a collection inside a foreach loop over that same collection! Refer to the textbook section 4.12 and in particular 4.12.2 ("Removing Elements") for one possible solution.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string representation of space: use:
  • " " for empty space
  • "W" for the invader
  • "i" for the cannon
  • "." for a bullet
if invader and cannon overlap, only draw the invader.
